programmes.show_description: If you don't get up and dance, you aren't human! Disco was the best floor show in town & once again it's time to get up & get lost in the pulse!
The voice of your childhood Derek Griffiths with 40 of those tunes you pestered your parents to buy - all top pop moments that still bring a smile & happy memories of school days!

From the era of glam rock, new wave and disco, it's all the hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?
60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Concorde, the Bionic Woman, The Honey Monster and Rentaghost all launched! And it was one of the hottest summers on record.
A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling UK singles UK for 1976 - can you believe these were all hits 50 years ago? And if you thought Abba were at number 1 - think again!

Another batch of silly songs, dodgy videos & novelty hits from the 70s. Yes every one of these was a huge hit!

The pop nerds at NOW 70s have been into the archives and pulled out 2 hours of amazing no.1s that only spent a single week on top! Big names include Kenny Rogers, The Quo & 10cc.

Every song comes from that vintage year when the sun shone all summer & Dave's band Showaddywaddy had their big number 1. Queen, Leo Sayer, Abba & Smokie also kept the hits coming.
